attributes.action: Stop the bells of Beverley Minster ringing 10pm - 8am
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Beverley Minster's bells go off every 15 minutes and every hour 24 hours a day, we find it hard to sleep and its driving us mad because its right near our house and we know its a very old building but they should stop the bells!!
